original_text: He has also put his mark on us, to show that we belong to him. He has given his Spirit to us, to live in us. Because of that, we know that we will receive all the good things that God has promised.
korean_text: 그가 또한 우리에게 인치시고 보증으로 우리 마음에 성령을 주셨느니라

sentences.original_text: He has also put his mark on us
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 우리에게 자신의 표시를 두셨고

sentences.original_text: to show that we belong to him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그에게 속한다는 것을 보여주시기 위해

sentences.original_text: He has given his Spirit to us
we know that we will receive
